Reviews.Title: ASUS K550CA-DH31 T Laptop Review
Reviews.Author: marsha
Reviews.Content: I had my 2 sons check out this laptop,& they loved it.I have a very bad back,and couldn't sit at desk anymore with any chair.This is my first laptop.I wanted touchscreen for sure.DVDRW/CD-RW,at least 4 GB,a medium screen size to watch movies,you tube,etc.Also, a descent battery life. I live in a very rural place,so my internet connection isn't the fastest.but so far its working good.  The only thing wrong is the battery life isn't as long as they say. My sons say thats how most laptops are. I am still learning how to use it,so far good. Price was very good,when I compared it to other brands similiar to it. Now I will have to decide on a virus,spyware protection plan,since it only came with a 30 day Mcafee trail. So far so good.

Reviews.Title: Under powered
Reviews.Author: Stewart1206
Reviews.Content: I bought this for someone else, but couldn't give it to them. Nice computer I love Asus, but Too sluggish... Returned

Reviews.Title: ASUS ADP program
Reviews.Author: Andres de Sta. Maria
Reviews.Content: It is a very good laptop. Aside from the one year warranty, I appreciate ASUS included this laptop in its accidental damage program (ADP) which is good for a year but one has to register this computer within 60 days.  My touchscreen cracked because of an accident and ASUS service center replaced the screen right away free of charge. Thank you very much ASUS.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-3217U 1.8 GHz
4 GB DDR3
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8, 5-hour battery life
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS K550CA-DH31T 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (Silver Grey)
